title: [RESEARCH] TUI rendering: diffing vs redraw, flicker prevention SOTA

logs.msg: Research: (1) Synchronized output (CSI 2026) support across terminals, (2) Line-level vs cell-level diffing overhead for small areas (5-15 lines), (3) Fallback strategies for unsupported terminals, (4) How pi-mono/codex/claude-code handle this. Goal: determine optimal approach for ion.
